about.details:
Madhavbaug is a medical service institution engaged in the treatment of chronic ailments like cardiac disease, diabetes, hypertension, and obesity by combining modern technology with the traditional Ayurveda practices. It uses non-invasive, multidisciplinary, and innovative therapies for treating chronic ailments. The company mainly offers treatment for (i) Health disease reversal, (ii) Diabetes Reversal, (iii) BP Management, (iv) Obesity management, Knee pain relief.

As of November 30, 2021, the company operates 274 clinics across Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Uttar Pradesh, Goa, Karnataka, Delhi, and Chhattisgarh. Out of these 52 are company-owned and 222 are franchise clinics. The company also operates two cardiac prevention and rehabilitation hospitals in Khopoli and Nagpur respectively.

The company offers several wellness products through their online portal Madhavbaug Wellness, and has an online app called MIB Pulse App which helps heart patients.

Competitive Strengths:

  • The amalgamation of modern and ancient methods for curing diseases
  • Affordable and non-invasive treatments
  • Experienced leadership and well-trained team
  • In-house IT platform for operational efficiency and innovations
  • MIS system for better management

faqs.question: What is the Madhavbaug IPO?
faqs.answer:
Madhavbaug IPO is a SME IPO of 2771200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.23 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹73 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 10, 2022, and closes on February 15, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Madhavbaug IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Madhavbaug IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Madhavbaug IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Madhavbaug IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Madhavbaug IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Madhavbaug IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Madhavbaug IPO opens on February 10, 2022 and closes on February 15, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Madhavbaug IPO?
faqs.answer: Madhavbaug IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,16,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Madhavbaug IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Madhavbaug IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Madhavbaug IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Madhavbaug IPO will be done on Friday, February 18, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 22, 2022. Check the Madhavbaug IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Madhavbaug IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Madhavbaug IPO listing date is on Wednesday, February 23, 2022.
